entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 08:00 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
